channel.title: 704 List of things I need help with
channel.description:
[b][u]List of things I would like help on[/u]:[/b]
All working shops, npc's, items..May need to hire a willing coder.
Moving the shops and editing them (I can not find how to edit shops on this revision)
Something simple: Adding mods, I know the code I just have trouble in placing it.
Getting heralds working
Adding, placing, editing npc's.
[s]Nerfing the skill rate[/s][Got help]
Working party room, Circus (Never have I saw a working one on a rsps)
Fix the Taverly gate so it will open
Yes this project will take a while, I don't expect it done by tomorrow. I may need more help but this is what i can think of.

item.title: 704 List of things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @xPandaz xPandaz
item.description:
@xPandaz wrote:

Andy1993:

I suggest finding a new source with stuff added if you cant add items to shops, also maybe try a 317 loading 600+… lol.

Lol, I would but I’m into the newer client, we all start somewhere.

Read full topic
